question:
Your Next Door neighbor often listens to loud music late at night. Because of the loud music , you often have problems sleeping.


Write a letter to the authority of the building.
 In your letter


Describe the situationExplain the problems it is causing you.Propose a solution to the problem
text: I am writing this letter to inform you about the trouble that I am facing in your residential building.

I have been living in this building for the last two years and my flat number is 555.Everything was fine here, until this new flat neighbour name John arrived. He is residing in 556 which is next to my flat. Since he plays music at roar volume at the midnight, it disturbs my sleep.

I work in a bank.These loud noises from his flat don’t let me sleep peacefully at night, therefore, I wake up late in the morning and get late for the office too. Moreover, I feel sleepy in the bank owing to not having  sound sleep.

I want to give my suggestion to curb this situation.You must talk to this new inhabitant and ask him not to play sounds at high volumes , if he cannot amend this then the glasses of his windows must be replaced with soundproof, consequently, no voices come out from his accommodation and will not harm our beauty sleep.
I will appreciate it if you take the necessary action urgently.
